cu.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid_level' will cause logging configuration failure and prevent proper log output.

du.explanation_en: Setting max_rxgain to 200, which exceeds the valid range for receiver gain, will cause invalid radio unit configuration and signal reception issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 max_rxgain 設定為 200，超出接收器增益的有效範圍，會導致無效的無線單元配置，並造成訊號接收問題。
